issue.title: Time type has no unit
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Time type should have a time unit field.
Right now we assume millis.
